Sentencas: Thin solid films of zirconia were deposited on solid and porous substrates over a range of deposition conditions by the pulsed-pressure metalorganic chemical vapor deposition (PP-MOCVD) process.
Titulo: Growth rate, microstructure and conformality as a function of vapor exposure for zirconia thin films by pulsed-pressure MOCVD

Sentencas: The PP-MOCVD process uses timed injections of a liquid precursor solution through an ultrasonic atomizer into a continuously evacuated reactor.
Titulo: Growth rate, microstructure and conformality as a function of vapor exposure for zirconia thin films by pulsed-pressure MOCVD

Sentencas: Process variables include solution injection volume, reactor volume, base pressure, peak pressure, and precursor concentration.
Titulo: Growth rate, microstructure and conformality as a function of vapor exposure for zirconia thin films by pulsed-pressure MOCVD

Sentencas: Solid nickel, co-sintered nickel cermet and [100] P-type silicon were investigated as substrates for a range of deposition conditions.
Titulo: Growth rate, microstructure and conformality as a function of vapor exposure for zirconia thin films by pulsed-pressure MOCVD

Sentencas: The exposure of the substrate to the precursor vapor was defined using a non-dimensional parameter combining the process parameters other than temperature.
Titulo: Growth rate, microstructure and conformality as a function of vapor exposure for zirconia thin films by pulsed-pressure MOCVD

Sentencas: Deposits were examined by SEM and XRD.
Titulo: Growth rate, microstructure and conformality as a function of vapor exposure for zirconia thin films by pulsed-pressure MOCVD

Sentencas: Results showed that PP-MOCVD produces a smooth, thin film that follows substrate contours.
Titulo: Growth rate, microstructure and conformality as a function of vapor exposure for zirconia thin films by pulsed-pressure MOCVD

Sentencas: High exposure rate results in a higher growth rate, and a thicker film with columnar microstructure that bridges most pores in the porous nickel cermet substrates.
Titulo: Growth rate, microstructure and conformality as a function of vapor exposure for zirconia thin films by pulsed-pressure MOCVD

Sentencas: The nickel cermet samples were prepared as electrode materials for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC's).
Titulo: Growth rate, microstructure and conformality as a function of vapor exposure for zirconia thin films by pulsed-pressure MOCVD

Sentencas: For the first time we demonstrate that arrival rate has a minimal effect on morphology and texture compared to deposition temperature.
Titulo: Growth rate, microstructure and conformality as a function of vapor exposure for zirconia thin films by pulsed-pressure MOCVD
Growth rate, microstructure and conformality as a function of vapor exposure for zirconia thin films by pulsed-pressure MOCVD
